QuestData.Title: Into the Fold
QuestData.Description: Before we can officially bring these taunka into the Horde we must recover our armaments from the Anub'ar Nerubians that infest the nearby woods. The armaments were lost when a caravan from Agmar's Hammer was ambushed by the Scourge late last night.$B$BVenture out into the woods to the east of Westwind Refugee Camp and recover those armaments, $r.
QuestData.LogDescription: Emissary Brighthoof at the Westwind Refugee Camp in the Dragonblight wants you to recover 10 Horde Armaments.
QuestData.CompletionText: Without armor and weapons our newest members will be defenseless in their trek to Agmar's Hammer.
QuestData.RewardText: This is exactly what we need, $n! Brandishing Horde arms will lift their spirits and give them the protection they need against the Scourge.$B$BAre you prepared for the ceremony of initiation?$B$B<Brighthoof nods.>$B$BYou will be the one to admit our new allies into the Horde.
